item.title: 28 gang members arrested during ‘Operation Mongolian Beef’ in Florida
item.description: 28 members of the Mongols motorcycle gang were taken into custody in Volusia County during ‘Operation Mongolian Beef’, according to law enforcement.

item.title: CCSO: Dispute leads to fatal shooting
item.description: CCSO: Dispute leads to fatal shooting

item.description: One man charged after teenager died in Port Charlotte shooting

item.title: Ryan Cole sentencedcto death for 2019 killing

item.title: Groundbreaking of the Sarasota County History Center and Fruitville Library Expansion
item.description: Groundbreaking of the Sarasota County History Center and Fruitville Library Expansion

item.title: DeSantis dispatches state emergency officials after Texas flooding
item.description: Governor Ron DeSantis has directed the Florida Division of Emergency Management to assist after catastrophic flooding in Texas.

item.title: Walton County Sheriff’s Office sends illegal immigrants to Alligator Alcatraz
item.description: Officials say the Walton County Sheriff’s Office has sent illegal immigrants to Alligator Alcatraz.

item.title: Former FSU researcher pleads guilty to distributing, receiving child sex abuse materials
item.description: A former Florida State University researcher has pleaded guilty to “distribution and receipt of child pornography,” according to the U.S. Attorney’s Office for the Northern District of Florida.

item.title: One man charged after teenager died in Port Charlotte shooting
item.description: The investigation is ongoing, although there is no continuing danger to the public.

item.title: Thunderstorms chances are lower
item.description: An isolated storm or two is possible as we start the week

item.title: ‘Mercy Chefs’ organization feeds thousands of flood victims, first responders in Texas
item.description: One organization that helped the Suncoast after Hurricane Milton is now helping Texas after devastating flooding tore through the Hill Country.

item.title: History, genealogy center to be part of Fruitville Library expansion
item.description: The new center will provide access to the county’s collection of local and regional history.

item.title: Burglar who killed Charlotte teen during home invasion sentenced to death
item.description: Ryan Cole was convicted of killing Khyler Edman while the teen was protecting his 5-year-old sister.

item.title: Turtle watchers report season’s first nests are hatching
item.description: Two of the first nests laid on Anna Maria Island hatched July 3.

item.title: Only a few storms and mostly inland
item.description: High pressure located over S. Florida will bring onshore flow which will bring a few isolated showers
